parameters.description: The connection mode to use: direct, zookeeper

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The connection mode to use: drillbit, zookeeper

parameters.name: cluster
parameters.description: The drillbit or zookeeper nodes including optional ports: node[:port],node[:port],etc

parameters.name: directory
parameters.description: Optional drill directory in zookeeper which by default is drill

parameters.name: clusterId
parameters.description: Optional cluster Id which by default is drillbits1

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: Optional name of a storage plugin configuration to use as the default for queries

parameters.name: tries
parameters.description: Optional tries parameter for drillbit connections
